Name: Dope
Review Text: Maybe it takes confidence in your own ability to call a place "Dope". Maybe it's a place in which all the staff make the atmosphere "dope" (and thank you for putting up an umbrella just for our table). Maybe it's because the pizza - ‚Ä¶

Name: Dope
Review Text: Pizza was worth the wait. Each pizza is crafted with the firewood oven, service time takes long but again, worth the wait! The dough was perfect, you would want to finish every single crust. The topping combination was sensational, ‚Ä¶

Name: Dope
Review Text: The pizza was amazing. Most likely the best pizza I‚Äôve ever had outside of Italy. The crust was spectacular! You can definitely see that they put their heart and soul into the prepping of their menu. Next to that, the restaurant has great ‚Ä¶

Name: Dope
Review Text: Fantastic pizza, really nice staff that will give you some cool Italian hints. High quality ingredients. If you're looking for authentic Italian experience in Amsterdam, that's the place!

Name: Dope
Review Text: Delicious pizza, good atmosphere, nice outside seating area.

Name: Dope
Review Text: Booked a table for 4 and were seated promptly upon arrival. We had the best seats in house right next to Pepe. Pepe was knocking out pizza after pizza, it was great to have front row seats to watch the whole process. ‚Ä¶

Name: Dope
Review Text: I ordered the Kala 2.0. This is the best pizza I ever had in my life. And I am really well traveled! ü§© the crust was so light but so chewy. It had an amazing bite. And it clearly tasted of gluten, salt and olive oil. Perfect. The cheese ‚Ä¶

Name: Dope
Review Text: I really recommend the pizza vegetariana with the spelt dough. The best pizza I have had in Amsterdam! Amazing staff and amazing food. Will definitely come back. :)

Name: Dope
Review Text: Amazing As Always! Probably the best Pizza in de pijp,  if not all of Amsterdam. No joke. Dine in only, and worth it. 5 Stars!

Name: Dope
Review Text:
The most delicious pizza that I ever tried!

Perfect service. Waiter straight away brought us water with ice. Other useful detail is that the password for wifi was written on menu. Tiramisu was with nice design. Perfect!

Name: Dope
Review Text: Delicious pizza, good atmosphere, nice outside seating area.

Name: Dope
Review Text: The pizzas were absolutely amazing! Very tasty, with excellent vegetarian and vegan options. We chose the vegetariana and the vegan flower blossom, and will be back soon to try some other ones. The staff are committed and very kind. Definitely a recommendation!

Name: Dope
Review Text: This pizza is the closest I‚Äôve eaten to authentic Italian pizza in Italy! Finally a pizza place that is amazing every time with fresh ingredients. I‚Äôve tried three different kinds and each one has been absolute perfection. Very delicious- order your own pie, you won‚Äôt want to share! üòâ üçï Friendly Italian staff.

Name: Dope
Review Text: The best pizza I've ever tasted without a doubt! Pizza handmade right in front of you with top quality Italian ingredients. This place is more than a restaurant, this is an Italian experience! totally recommended.

Name: Dope
Review Text: Best pizza ever! Very delicious and super tasty.. the staff are amazing, even tho we waited a long time to get the food.. the owner was very kind and apologetic and also offer us free coffee!!. We ended the night with an outstanding tiramisu! Definitely well made pizza and sweets..

Name: Dope
Review Text: Definitely one of the top 3 pizza places in Amsterdam. The quality is the same you could find in a good pizzeria in Italy. The dough is soft and very delicious + the ingredients are very good. The staff is nice, friendly and welcoming. A big plus is the fact you can have it also take away or delivered at home.

Name: Dope
Review Text: I really recommend the pizza vegetariana with the spelt dough. The best pizza I have had in Amsterdam! Amazing staff and amazing food. Will definitely come back. :)

Name: Dope
Review Text: They are able to make you feel like in a family (a perfect family with a cat :), you can even find fresh homemade bread and desserts... And the pizza is a masterpiece, everyone should eat the real Italian pizza! Recommended for vegan people!

Name: Dope
Review Text: We like the place so much, Pizza so delicious if you come to Europe you must come here only to eat the pizza here

Name: Dope
Review Text: Great pizza and tiramisu. Would give 5 starts if the service was faster and more attentive after 7pm when all tables are occupied.

Name: Dope
Review Text: The pizzas were delicious. They have a wide variety of vegan pizzas as well. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. The place is quite small so make sure to reserve a table before going.

Name: Dope
Review Text: Really good pizza place. Staff were very friendly and the pizza was amazing. Heaps of choices to choose from including vegetarian and vegan options. Service was initially a bit slow but picked up.

Name: Dope
Review Text:
Amazing food! Excellent service, and the staff are very kind. Great experience.

They made me a pizza from scratch even though they were shutting down for the ‚Ä¶

Name: Dope
Review Text: The best Pizza in Amsterdam, fantastic staff and really friendly atmosphere but the organisation is terrible. I have tried many times to book a table and they don't reply to phone or shut off the line or don't reply in the social media. If ‚Ä¶

Name: Dope
Review Text: Fantastic authentic pizza! This has got to be the best pizza in Amsterdam! Also, very nice staff and lots of vegetarian and vegan options! The prices are absolutely okay, considering the high quality pizza you're gonna get! ‚Ä¶

Name: Dope
Review Text: DOPE has upgraded with a new location and it‚Äôs better than ever before! I‚Äôve already been going there for years and I would recommend all vegans and non-vegans alike to try out their food! Best vegan pizzas & calzone (with good quality ‚Ä¶

Name: Dope
Review Text: wow, fantastic. amazing pizza that was so so fresh and flavourful. and despite them being busy, the staff were attentive, nice, and the chef loves compliments so make sure to tell him his pizza is incredible when you leave.

Name: Dope
Review Text: Stunning pizzas and tiramisu. However, don't take reservations at 7.30 if you can only manage to serve drinks at 8.00 and take a food order one hour after we sat down. Hire more staff if you're that busy

Name: Dope

Review Text: It's absolutely the best napolitana you can get in amsterdam, it's perfect. The space is not so big, and it‚Äôs normally crowded, so if you want to eat here, reserve or be patience. The staff is kind and they are all Italian.

Name: Dope

Pizza: delicious but you can not ask to take out meat or a vegetable in a receipt if you don‚Äôt like it.

Name: Dope
Review Text: Super food, they just make you wait a while before you order but after you do the food comes quickly

Name: Dope
Review Text: Truly the best pizzeria in town. Authentic ingredients and perfect execution; the first pizza bite made me think that I was in Naples. The hospitality was also excellent. I can‚Äôt wait to come back!

Name: Dope
Review Text: The best pizza I had in my life, fantastic options of Italian craft beer, and amazing service level. I would give this place 6 stars if possible.

Name: Dope
Review Text: Best Pizza we've ever had. And the tiramisu is absolutely delicious!! Tastes so fresh and just so light. Definitely worth taking your time to come here and enjoy every last bit of it! It lives up to the reviews!!

Name: Dope
Review Text: Crazy good vegan four cheese pizza. The service was incredible, we had to change table and got given a really tasty vegan tiramisu for the 'hassle'. They serve wine in Italian quantities, and offer pizza so good that you'll ignore your stomach and eat the whole thing. Cannot recommend this place more.

Name: Dope
Review Text: I love pizza. My friends love pizza. Every week, we eat pizza... so when I go on holiday this ‚Äòaddiction‚Äô doesn‚Äôt get overlooked. Add this to the fact that sightseeing Amsterdam is hungry work so what better way to fuel the trip than with ‚Ä¶

Name: Dope
Review Text: Dope is the place where pizza reaches its finest expression. Careful research in the mix of flours used to make the dough, superbe quality ingredients and highly talented pizza makers, together produce an outstanding result. La calabrese with burrata & la pizza fritta are my top choices. Definitely suggested!

Name: Dope
Review Text: Very bad service, with bad manners. We went there to see friends, and the owner yelled at my friend and I because we were not sure about our order ("I have a business to run, leave if you don't order now" even if nobody was waiting for a ‚Ä¶

Name: Dope
Review Text:
The vegan Margherita is very good! I love that they have more than one vegan option.

Name: Dope
Review Text: Amazing vegan, truly Italian Pizza. Tiny and cosy place, where the guys treat you like a family (the good kind). Going back today to try the coffee & the vegan desserts. And more üçï!

Review Text: Advertised as takeout/ delivery, but after a long walk to their location I was told dine in only. What pizza place only does dine in?! This one! Good luck‚Ä¶

Review Text: This is a place we will return to. Together with Eatmosfera Oost, around the corner from where we live, Pizzeria Dope serves the best pizza's in town. Really, really good. Simple choice of wine: white or red. But don't be fooled, it's a ‚Ä¶

Review Text: Such a great pizza! All toppings are fresh (parma ham freshly cut!) and the tomato sauce was also really delicious. A cute little place that I can‚Äôt recommend enough :)

Review Text: Great Pizza and very kind staff

Name: Dope
Review Text: Probably one of the best pizza I've ever had!

Name: Dope

Name: Dope
Review Text: Came across this wonderful intimate pizzeria in the de Pijp area of Amsterdam. Authentic fresh Italian pizzas - some of the best around and great choices, friendly and welcoming atmosphere - Peppe is a great host. So good!

Name: Dope
Review Text: Friendly and very kind people are around there. The pizza was perfect, I would even say the best pizza I‚Äôve ever eaten. Definitely, worth to check it out.

Name: Dope
Review Text: We waited for 45 minutes to get our food, they were obciously understaffed and nobody even came to ask us for drinks or after we finished to pay or anything. Terrible experience, everyone around js was very hungry and also waiting forever. ‚Ä¶

Name: Dope
Review Text: Pizza is delicious and super light, with high quality ingredients! It's way better than the pizza I used to eat at home, in Italy <3 also the staff is nice and helpful, and restaurant has a spectacular design, from the chairs to the coffe machine.

Name: Dope
Review Text: Apparently great vegetarian options, but it took over 40 minutes before we could order our pizzas.

Review Text: Best (vegan) pizza I ever had! The thin dough is delicious and the vegan cheeses are top notch! I was shocked to see that Mastino had closed but as I understand their pizza baker just took over the place and I can still get my fix of the vegan four cheese pizza! Much worth a visit!

Review Text: Best original Napolitan pizza in Amsterdam to date! Fresh superb ingredients and proper dough. Guys are very friendly and cat is adorable! In one phrase: worth getting fat over :p

Name: Dope
Review Text: Craft, professionalism, passion in a niche with minimal furnishings and limited capacity. But here, this is not what matters. In fact, what is striking is the huge variety of pizzas, the quality of the ingredients and especially the doughs. ‚Ä¶

Name: Dope
Review Text: incredible vegan pizza, they make their own vegan cheese which was unbelievably good, for my main i ate the vegan calzone and it‚Äôs one of the best pizzas i have eaten. my girlfriend had the vegan new moon and that was also amazing (they added extra cherry tomatoes which was a great choice). very friendly and fast service also.
